cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Product__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Product__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Product__c.description: This object stores the details of the product that's assigned to a promotion reward.

cgcloud__Default_Value__c.description: Default value that's to be delivered for this product.

cgcloud__Included__c.description: Defines whether the product is to be included on pricing calculations in the context of selectable promotions.

cgcloud__Logistic_Unit__c.description: Unit of measure of the products that belong to a promotion reward.

cgcloud__Max_Value__c.description: Maximum value that can be delivered for this product.

cgcloud__Product_Unique__c.description: Unique identifier of the linked product.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Lookup to the product to which the specific configuration applies.

cgcloud__Promotion_Reward__c.description: Master-Detail to the reward to which the product-specific configuration applies.

cgcloud__Reward_Type__c.description: Formula to show the type of the related reward.
